Description: Painted pottery shabti of B3k... with a back striated lappet-wig, a yellow modelled face, a large yellow and red collar and crossed hands in high relief holding two black hoes; the leg section is inscribed with Chapter 6 of the Book of the Dead in five rows of black Hieroglyphic text; brown representations of sandals on the feet and a brown diagonally-slung seed-bag on the back.
